featured.text: Ancient Athens, famous for its early development of the democratic system, is often said to be the _____ of democracy.

definition.zh_def: 民主：一種政治制度，公民通過選舉選擇代表或直接參與決策。
definition.en_def: A system of government in which the citizens exercise power directly or elect representatives to make decisions on their behalf.
definition.example: In a democracy, every citizen has the right to vote for their leaders.
